noun.description: A caddis fly of the genus Phryganea or family Phryganeidae (order Trichoptera).

adjective.description: Of or relating to the family Phryganeidae of caddis flies.

origin: Mid 19th century. From scientific Latin Phryganeidae family name from Phryganea + -idae, after the former group name Phryganides.
